title: Potential scripter still isn't banned after at least 50 reports (I'd imagine)
body:
(Removed links due to forum rules)

He seem's like he's cheating and a quick look at his match history indicated that he intentionally feeds whenever he isn't playing xerath and yet STILL he's able to play. Can this please be investigated? I can understand there not being much of an issue when its in silver-plat games but seriously. He's currently Diamond 3, playing WITH OPL players and as far as I can tell there's not been any action done about it. 

http://plays.tv/video/5865c8ffcade248a84/tell-me-he-isnt-scripting-ribss

replies.body:
Yeah he jerked and spazzed like 3 times in around the 4 second mark of the video, suspicion is rising.

Though I must say, OP, player cheating is a big issue regardless of which elo range they're playing at. In fact it's more serious in low elo because that's where the vast majority of the players are at and thus scripters in low elo makes for some very bad impression of the game for the players than they would be otherwise pose in the higher elo bracket.

Still try report this to league support or something, I don't suppose it's gonna do more work here than posting through the report section of the support.

> player cheating is a big issue regardless of which elo range they're playing at. 
> 

Granted it is, but it's a bit less of an issue due to it not affecting professional and potentially professional play. Not to make it seem or sound less serious as cheating at all is serious, but I think that scripters affecting professionals negatively is slightly more concerning than it affecting people in bronze, again not to make taken as less seriously, just not as potentially detrimental. But I'm not Riot so that isn't my call. 

>that's where the vast majority of the players are at and thus scripters in low elo makes for some very bad impression of the game 
>

Yes that's true, but it doesn't affect the professional play of the game in any way. Again as I said before it isn't to be taken less seriously due to this, it just doesn't seem like an immediate problem. 

Thank you for the support ticket idea, I'll try that instead as this seems to get more of a general topic feedback rather than what I was expecting.

Looks like **SEKAI** has already got you on the right track with a support ticket :)

One thing I'll just remind you about is that these guys are [banned in waves](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/AEVP3NMA-anti-cheater-banwave-incoming), not as soon as they are detected. That's why this guy is playing after 50 reports.

I believe we're due for a ban wave quite soon though, so hopefully he gets taken out in that :D

Oh. Didn't know that was how it worked in OCE, figured it would work differently here due to our server population being much lower. 

Already sent a support ticket and it's been solved, I guess now I just wait. It is quite frustrating that players in high rating can still be allowed to play but I suppose due to it being early season it's relevance is much lower than it would be if it was closer to the end of the season. 

Thanks a lot for the help out.

i doubt that our population being small is gonna help tho, we still have like thousands of players + the players from other servers i doubt that even a couple hundred rioters would be able to intercept a scripter in that many players that fast
looks a little fishy but no ones going to pay attention to that instead they are going to get all anal about you name and shaming
